requirement: This code is intended to implement a countdown timer that calculates the remaining seconds based on the elapsed time and total time.
provide_code:
FUNCTION_BLOCK FB_CountdownTimer
VAR_INPUT
	tElapsedTime	:	TIME;		//已经过的时间（定时器的ET）
	tTotalTime		:	TIME;		//总时间（定时器的PT）
END_VAR
VAR_OUTPUT
	nRemainingSeconds	:	UINT;	//剩余秒数
END_VAR
